name: GRAVEYARD DUDE Homebrew NES game.
description:
This is my first NES homebrew game, GRAVEYARD DUDE. It was built using the Retro Puzzle Maker, after which I heavily modified it with new graphics and music:

puzzle.nes.science/home

The current package includes the original demo released in May as part of the INDIEPOCALYPSE bundle and an enhanced demo with new graphics, music and a difficulty tweak as a transition for the full version later this summer. The full version will be released here too, so purchasing this package also buys the full version in advance.
